definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="JsonObject" id="amaljsonobj">amaljsonobj</variable><variable type="File" id="hybridconfig">hybridconfig</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">mod_load</field><next><block type="variables_set_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:hybridconfig</field><value name="VAL"><block type="file_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:hybridconfig</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">hybridvxconfig.json</field></block></value><value name="location"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="get_game_directory"></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/config/</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="file_exists"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:hybridconfig</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="create_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:hybridconfig</field><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:amaljsonobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">hybrid_spawntime_min</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">60</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:amaljsonobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">hybrid_spawntime_max</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">240</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:amaljsonobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">a random number is generated between min and max for the spawn time, the spawn numbers are in seconds so set how many seconds you want it to take for him to spawn on min and max, WARNING do not make max time lower than min time otherwise it will cause bugs or crash the game</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:amaljsonobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">can_have_panic_attacks</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:amaljsonobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">hallucination_jumpscare</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:amaljsonobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">hybrid_spawn_chance</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:amaljsonobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">if you want a higher chance of the hybrid spawning set the spawn chance to a lower number, if you want a lower chance for the hybrid to spawn set the spawn chance to a higher number, WARNING do not set this number below 1 otherwise it may bug or crash the game</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:amaljsonobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">hybrid_chase_music</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:amaljsonobj</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">hybrid_mftf_ai_spawn_sound</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="write_json"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="JOBJVAR">local:amaljsonobj</field><field name="VAR">local:hybridconfig</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
